title: Laura, le compte à rebours a commencé
overview: For three generations, the first births of the Fontane family died mysteriously on July 22 at the age of 26 years. Today, Laura Fontane is 26 years old and she returns to Nice to marry the man she loves. But in a few days we will be July 22: Laura finds herself dipped in the heart of the family curse ... While murders accumulate around her and the two rival families, who do not accept this marriage, tear, the fateful date is getting closer. For Laura, the countdown has begun...
